question: Python Program for Analyzing Plant Growth and Determining Constant k with a Differential Equation
definition: A farmer wants to integrate a new water system into their field. They believe they can model plant growth using a differential equation. Factors affecting plant growth in the field include sunlight, soil moisture levels, and fertilizer amounts. Based on the farmer's data, they think they can model plant growth using the following differential equation: dt/dP=(1−e−kt)⋅I⋅N⋅G
description: Here, P represents plant size, t represents time, k is a constant, I represents sunlight intensity (ranging from 0 to 10), N represents soil moisture level (ranging from 0 to 10), G represents fertilizer amount (ranging from 0 to 10). The farmer wants to optimize plant growth using this equation. However, they need to perform data analysis to find the value of the constant k. They have data on time and plant size at their disposal.
